name: Job Crowd
tag_list: freelancing, freelancer, freelance, job-crowd, jobcrowd, outsourcing, outsource
overview:
Job Crowd was co-founded in 2011 to offer freelance and full time workers a place connect as part of the global development community. At Job Crowd, workers can browse both freelance and full time employment opportunities; interact with a diverse range of employers from across the globe, and tender for projects and technical roles no matter where they are in the world.

At itâ€™s core, JobCrowd.com allows employers to conduct projects which source either topic area specialists with a diverse range of skills suited to smaller project timelines, or the opportunity to hire numerous freelance workers simultaneously as part of a greater â€œproject crowdâ€ enabling employers to hire the most suitable freelancers to handle smaller pieces of a larger project whole. This unique feature of Job Crowd allows employers to hire both employees who have worked together previously and have had positive interactions, and employees who are more suited to working in teams or posses and excellent singular skill set.

With hundreds of project categories, Job Crowd offers a truly extensive array of project categories for the part-time or professional freelancer to choose from, however we also offer a dynamic marketplace where designers and developers can sell unique works such as logos, original code fragments and previous work which may be reused by individuals or companies in need of such content. Job Crowd is truly the leading online marketplace for both human and digital resources.
